thanks, lkcthereturn

item.title: Removing pimpscape's summoning.. will rep
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“wwe4eva, post:2, topic:324435”]Pimpscape has summoning?

Wtf is going on with the world…[/quote]

Pimpscape had summoning before Runescape did, lol.

Ok so to remove summoning, open the client class and find:

public void SummonNPC

Delete that entire method to the last }

Now find:

case 46165:

You’ll see:

case 46165: SummonNPC(101); break; case 16191: SummonNPC(1655); break; case 16192: SummonNPC(77); break; case 16193: SummonNPC(749); break; case 16194: SummonNPC(92); break; case 43126: SummonNPC(1693); break; case 16195: SummonNPC(1241); break; case 16196: SummonNPC(1265); break; case 16197: SummonNPC(2803); break; case 16198: SummonNPC(2880); break; case 16199: SummonNPC(2892); break; case 16200: SummonNPC(2885); break; case 34231: SummonNPC(1246); break; case 16201: SummonNPC(1172); break; case 16202: SummonNPC(2740); break; case 16203: SummonNPC(1575); break; case 16204: SummonNPC(1645); break; case 16205: SummonNPC(2919); break; case 16206: SummonNPC(509); break; case 16207: SummonNPC(3497); break; case 16208: SummonNPC(3070); break; case 58024: SummonNPC(1590); break; case 2152: SummonNPC(1591); break; case 35011: SummonNPC(1592); break; case 16210: SummonNPC(3494); break;

Delete all of that.

Read full topic
